programme.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas
programme.desc: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.

programme.title: Adiós Gringo
programme.desc: A gunslinger on the run for a murder he didn't commit goes to New Mexico where he hopes to find a person who can exculpate him. While on his way he finds a girl who has been kidnapped and tortured, sets her free and then takes his revenge at gunpoint.

programme.title: Fighters from Ave Maria
programme.desc: Western spaghetti set in gold rush times in California, involving circus acrobats, outlaws and a gold mine.

programme.title: Bounty Hunter in Trinity
programme.desc: The townsfolk of Trinity decide to hire a notorious bounty hunter to protect them from a fierce band of Mexican outlaws who are terrorizing the area.

programme.title: Against a Crooked Sky
programme.desc: The eldest daughter of a pioneer family is kidnapped by a mysterious Indian tribe and the eldest son pursues. In order to win back his sister's freedom, he must sacrifice his own life by passing the test of "Crooked Sky" and shield his sister from an executioner's arrow. Along the way, he recruits a broken down, drunk prospector to help him track down the unknown tribe and rescue his sister.

programme.title: Django Meets Sartana
programme.desc: The small desert town of Black City is held in a reign of terror by a nasty gang of criminals lead by the ruthless Bud Willer.

programme.title: Tequila
programme.desc: Tequila and Bobo hit the little town of Chedron intending to rob the local bank whose owner, De Koven, is trying to freeze out all the ranchers in the area by the simple expedient of foreclosing on the mortgages his bank holds on their land.

programme.title: Brother Outlaw
programme.desc: A man is falsely charged with bank robbery, prompting his brother to break him out of prison.

programme.title: Texas, Adios
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff and his younger brother travel across the Mexican border to confront the man who killed their father.

programme.title: Rattler Kid
programme.desc: Falsely convicted for robbing an army treasury, Tony Garrett escapes prison and sets out to find the real criminals responsible. As he hunts for revenge, he faces dangers and uncovers dark truths, determined to clear his name and make the true culprits pay for their actions.

programme.title: If you meet Sartana... Pray for your Death
programme.desc: Crooked bankers plan an insurance swindle and hire a Mexican gang to steal the bank's gold but they also pay Lasky's gang to kill the Mexicans.

programme.title: Dead are Countless
programme.desc: As a child, Johnny witnessed his father’s death at the hands of soldiers. Now an outlaw, he seeks revenge by killing soldiers whenever possible. Lieutenant Garringo is tasked with capturing Johnny and bringing him back alive. A dangerous game of cat and mouse ensues, with Garringo determined to fulfill his mission.

programme.title: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: Johnny King, a rebellious drifter, sets out to avenge the death of his mentor and friend, Steve, after he has been murdered for his land by the Ward Brothers.

programme.title: Requiem for a Gringo
programme.desc: A unique Euro-western with the hero as an astrologist who wears a leopard suit.

programme.title: Tequila Joe
programme.desc: A young deputy tries to sober and revitalize a washed up, alcoholic sheriff to take down a pair of warring gangs of criminals in the Old West.
